title: [Health] Scientific review of 194 research publications suggests that moderate coffee consumption was not found to generate harmful effects of the digestive tract. The research found the association with a reduced risk of gallstones and the evidence of a reduced risk of pancreatitis

[Medicine] Discovery of a “hidden gem” enables gene editing with a small but mighty CRISPR-Cas3 system - Enhanced research tool is a potential boon for research in genetic diseases and developmental biology
